positive.review:
It's just a game with a great mechanism. Created with love by the people that developed it.

It should serve as a base and be used as a formula to expand twice on the current in-game mechanics for future releases.

Sadly, this comment will be ignored (yet again) by the developers. 

P.S. People don't care of new graphics and "breathing" portraits of characters that make them look live.
Definitely still worth playing with the English patch. The best ROTK game there is!

This is the best version of Romance of the Three Kingdoms.  It has more of a focus on kingdom management and tactical combat than the other more RPG-like versions.

Unfortunately while the base game has an official english translation, the Power Up Kit does not. As such, you need to use the unofficial translation patch.  This fan made translation is actually quite good but it has one main flaw which is officer names.  You need to use another editor to manual add english officer names as the game's engine doesn't natively support them.  A minor inconvenience all things told but I find it surprising that Koei never made an official version.

amazing that accompany me since childhood time, been playing it on and off for more than 15 yrs!
This version is still one of the best
An classic Simulation Game with chinese heroic history
Classic for ever.
plz make english version plz
very fun game
good
good
